body_html:
Can you add a symlink from /usr/local/cuda to /usr/local/cuda-8.0 and then add /usr/local/cuda (or it might be /usr/local/cuda/lib64 , I can't test which works on my personal machine) to LD_LIBRARY_PATH ?

The problem probably is not sudo, as that usually only matters during the install step when the build copies from the build-directory to final system install locations. It is found in the cmake step b/c cmake has special CUDA-specific logic to search for libraries in certain paths, which is not present in the make step. The make step only uses the default system paths, which does not know about CUDA.
